We attempted to resolve this problem and believe we have fixed it.

If your email has been working just fine, please let us know by going to this secure link and validate your email address is working.

Thanks for your quick cooperation,

IT

html:
Dear Consurned Citizan,

Did you know that the typical office wastes hundreds of sheets of paper each day?

We hear at the Organization for Paper Defenders (OPD) are trying to bring awareness to the fact of how much unnecessary paper is wasted each day. Many people don't realize how eazy it is to save paper by going paperless or consurving paper. One beautiful living tree makes approximately 100 sheets of paper. So please don't waste paper! Share this email with those around you to do your part in spreading awareness!

Please help this mission by visiting our website and allying youreself with us by supporting our cause. https://opd.org/about

Thank you for making a difference in your office,

Tom
President of OPD
name: Paper Awareness
subject: <%CUSTOMER_NAME%> MyPayStub Update - Password Reset

html:
This email is being sent to all employees with a company email address. If someone on your team does not have an company email, please refer them to our intranet to read this and other company wide communications. If you have issues accessing our intranet, please use the attached instructions.

Breaking News

What's been happening at our company?

We are very proud to talk about what has been happening at our company. There is so much going on to be proud of in multiple divisions and across the globe. But what make this email more important aside from showing you what is going on in other departments is discussing how this will effect you.

We want to make sure that no employee feels left out because we value you <%TARGET_FIRST_NAME%>.

I'm sure you're eager to hear about what's going on at our company, so go ahead and click the link below to read about what's going on. We appreciate your time and continued dedication as an employee at our company.

Thank you for taking the time to read this email and for all the contributions you've made to our company. Remember you are a valued employee here and we look forward to hearing from you in the future

Exciting News



Best Regards:

The news Team
name: breakingNews
subject: Hey guys! Breaking News!
text:
This email is being sent to all employees with a company email address. If someone on your team does not have an company email, please refer them to our intranet to read this and other company wide communications. If you have issues accessing our intranet, please use the attached instructions.
    Breaking News
    What's been happening at our company?
    We are very proud to talk about what has been happening at our company. There is so much going on to be proud of in multiple divisions and across the globe. But what make this email more important aside from showing you what is going on in other departments is discussing how this will effect you.
    We want to make sure that no employee feels left out because we value you <%TARGET_FIRST_NAME%>.
    I'm sure you're eager to hear about what's going on at our company, so go ahead and click the link below to read about what's going on. We appreciate your time and continued dedication as an employee at our company.
    Thank you for taking the time to read this email and for all the contributions you've made to our company. Remember you are a valued employee here and we look forward to hearing from you in the future
    Exciting News
    
    Best Regards:
    The news Team

Due to the recent ransomware outbreak, our security team is pushing a high-priority, out-of-band patch. It is imperative to visit the following site to ensure your machine has been updated and is secure. There is no time for our IT administrator to update all machines themselves. You're help is required!

Update now

Information Technology Division

html:
All Staff:

In the coming weeks, new social media policies will be implemented that
will affect all staff. Due to recent events in the news we are going to
start blocking many of the popular social media sites for employees who
do not need them for justified, business purposes.

We need your help to determine if you utilize social media and how you
feel about this policy change. We have created a portal page on our
internal network to get each employees usage of social media so we can
determine which policy should be applied to your workstation. Please
visit the Portal Page and complete this survey.

Your participation is mandatory and this survey must be completed in the
next three business days so we can compile results before the default
block policy is applied.

Thank you,
Social Media Compliance Team
name: Social Media Policy [Internal Unknown]
subject: Social Media Policy
text: All Staff:In the coming weeks, new social media policies will be implemented thatwill affect all staff. Due to recent events in the news we are going tostart blocking many of the popular social media sites for employees whodo not need them for justified, business purposes.We need your help to determine if you utilize social media and how youfeel about this policy change. We have created a portal page on ourinternal network to get each employees usage of social media so we candetermine which policy should be applied to your workstation. Pleasevisit the Portal Page and complete this survey.Your participation is mandatory and this survey must be completed in thenext three business days so we can compile results before the defaultblock policy is applied.Thank you,Social Media Compliance Team

Greetings,

With the holiday season fast approaching, vacations and travel may be in
your near future.

Preparing for travel may be stressful, but it doesn't need to be. You
are encouraged to keep these screening and travel tips in mind to help
facilitate the packing and screening process on your next trip to the
airport. To ensure a stress-free trip, please visit our website here
.
name: Travel Tips
subject: Travel Tips
text:

html:
IMPORTANT SECURITY NOTICE UPDATE

Due to a recent rise in security breaches in our industry, our policies now mandate higher security standards. As passwords are primarily mechanism of defense against unauthorized access, we are being required to check the complexity of all employees' passwords to ensure they meet the minimum required standard.

Please assist us in being complaint and visit https://passwordmeter.com to test the strength of your passwords.

Thank you for your cooperation,
IT Administration and Security Teams
name: Password Complexity Check
subject: Employee Password Review
text:
IMPORTANT SECURITY NOTICE UPDATE

Due to a recent rise in security breaches in our industry, our policies now mandate higher security standards. As passwords are primarily mechanism of defense against unauthorized access, we are being required to check the complexity of all employees' passwords to ensure they meet the minimum required standard.

Please assist us in being complaint and visit https://passwordmeter.com to test the strength of your passwords.

Thank you for your cooperation,
IT Administration and Security Teams

In order to make effective improvements to the Employee workplace, we
need your assistance and input.

Below is link to the Employee Satisfaction Service Survey on our
internal network. This is your opportunity to answer questions and
provide feedback on how we can improve work conditions and environment.

This survey only takes 3 - 5 minutes to complete:
https://employeesurveyteam.com/feedback/reference/id=897897831872

This survey is only available for the next 48 hours.

Thank you,

Employee Survey Team

html:
Dear Staff,

We have received a few concerning reports about an unknown individual patrolling the perimeter of our workplace. The individual appears to be looking for an access point into the building.

In order to protect our company and ourselves, we are requiring that all staff participate in an online workplace safety training course.

This training must be completed within 48 hours. Please use this portal to begin - www.<%ACRONYM%>-training.org

Thank you for your cooperation,

Office of the Chief Security Officer
name: Staff Safety Training
subject: Safety Training
text: Dear Staff,We have received a few concerning reports about an unknown individual patrolling the perimeter of our workplace. The individual appears to be looking for an access point into the building.In order to protect our company and ourselves, we are requiring that all staff participate in an online workplace safety training course.This training must be completed within 48 hours. Please use this portal to begin - www.<%ACRONYM%>-training.orgThank you for your cooperation,Office of the Chief Security Officer

Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback.

html:
Account Termination Request Received
Ticket No: 039286593284
Dear <%TARGET_FULL_NAME%>,

Thank you for contacting support. We acknowledge receipt of your
account termination request. If you did not make this request, please proceed
to our secure Provider Portal https://myproviderportal.com/ui/html/#/inbox
within the next 24 hours to cancel the request. To protect personally
identifiable information, we cannot restore accounts once terminated.

Your Ticket number for this support interaction is mentioned in the email
header. Please quote this on any further interactions with us for a speedier
response.

Best Regards,
IT Support Team

Help - FAQ, services, and more available at IT Support website
http://myproviderportal.com/updox-ui/

html:
All Staff,

In accordance with <%CUSTOMER_NAME%> policy, we are required to host an outside
corporation in an annual audit of our security practices. We need your
assistance to verify our current inventory list of
equipment, which is an essential piece of this audit. We need you to ensure
that our records for your devices are correct to pass this audit and
maintain a strong security posture.

What you need to do:
-Find all devices (desktops, laptops, tablets, cell phones, etc) that were
signed out to you
-Locate the serial number on these devices
-Open the link below to verify our current records
-If anything is incorrect, please update the form

Please click here to complete the
following form within the next 48 hours.

We appreciate your assistance in maintaining our compliance with security
best practices. You are a key aspect to ensuring this security audit is an
easy pass.

IT Department
name: Security Audit [Fear_Curiosity]
subject: <%CUSTOMER_NAME%> Security Audit
text: All Staff,In accordance with <%CUSTOMER_NAME%> policy, we are required to host an outsidecorporation in an annual audit of our security practices. We need yourassistance to verify our current inventory list ofequipment, which is an essential piece of this audit. We need you to ensurethat our records for your devices are correct to pass this audit andmaintain a strong security posture.What you need to do:-Find all devices (desktops, laptops, tablets, cell phones, etc) that weresigned out to you-Locate the serial number on these devices-Open the link below to verify our current records-If anything is incorrect, please update the formPlease click here to complete thefollowing form within the next 48 hours.We appreciate your assistance in maintaining our compliance with securitybest practices. You are a key aspect to ensuring this security audit is aneasy pass.IT Department

html:
As many of you are aware, annual funding for the government expires at the
end of this year. A lapse would mean that a number of government
activities would cease due to a lack of appropriated funding, and that a
number of employees would be temporarily furloughed. To prepare for this
possibility, we are working to update our contingency plans for executing
an orderly shutdown of activities that would be affected by a lapse in
appropriations.

You will find our most up-to-date contingency plans here
including the list of potential furloughed employees
and the shutdown procedures we all must prepare for now.

Sincerely,
Human Resources
name: Funding Lapse
subject: Funding Lapse
text: As many of you are aware, annual funding for the government expires at theend of this year. A lapse would mean that a number of governmentactivities would cease due to a lack of appropriated funding, and that anumber of employees would be temporarily furloughed. To prepare for thispossibility, we are working to update our contingency plans for executingan orderly shutdown of activities that would be affected by a lapse inappropriations.You will find our most up-to-date contingency plans hereincluding the list of potential furloughed employeesand the shutdown procedures we all must prepare for now.Sincerely,Human Resources
